Item ID4694

Steam runes are combination runes. They can be used as one fire rune and one water rune. Thus, any spell requiring one fire rune, one water rune, or both will spend only one steam rune.

They can be created with the Runecraft skill or purchased with Pizazz points from the Mage Training Arena.

When equipped, the steam battlestaff and mystic steam staff provide an unlimited number of steam runes.

Contents

  • 1 Runecraft info
    • 1.1 Water Altar
    • 1.2 Fire Altar
  • 2 Spells requiring both water and fire runes
  • 3 Item sources
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Runecraft info[edit | edit source]

At 19 Runecraft or higher, they can be crafted in either of two ways:

  • Bringing pure essence, fire runes, and a fire talisman to the Water Altar (for 9.5 Runecraft xp per rune)
  • Bringing pure essence, water runes, and a water talisman to the Fire Altar (for 10.0 Runecraft xp per rune)

You may wear a tiara to enter and use the altar, but the other element must be a talisman when crafting combination runes. Clicking on the altar or using a pure essence on it will produce normal runes. To prevent creating the wrong runes, make sure you are using the complementary rune on the altar. For example, at the Fire Altar use the water runes on the altar.

Combinations have a 50% success rate (or 100%, if the player is wearing a binding necklace), and the talisman is consumed in the process (unless the player uses the Lunar spell Magic Imbue). The elemental talisman will also not work in place of talismans when crafting the runes.

Lvl Exp
Ape Atoll Teleport 64 74 2 2 2 1 Teleport Standard
Bake Pie 65 60 5 4 1 Utility Lunar
Humidify 68 65 1 3 1 Utility Lunar
Kourend Castle Teleport 69 82 5 4 2 2 Teleport Standard
Magic Imbue 82 86 7 7 2 Utility Lunar

They can be used as one [[fire rune]] ''and'' one [[water rune]]. Thus, any [[spell]] requiring one fire rune, one water rune, or both will spend only one steam rune. They can be created with the [[Runecraft]] [[skill]] or purchased with [[Pizazz points]] from the [[Mage Training Arena]]. When equipped, the [[steam battlestaff]] and [[mystic steam staff]] provide an unlimited number of steam runes. ==Runecraft info== At {{SCP|Runecraft|19|link=yes}} or higher, they can be crafted in either of two ways: * Bringing [[pure essence]], [[fire rune]]s, and a [[fire talisman]] to the [[Water Altar]] (for 9.5 Runecraft xp per rune) * Bringing pure essence, [[water rune]]s, and a [[water talisman]] to the [[Fire Altar]] (for 10.0 Runecraft xp per rune) You may wear a [[Tiara (disambiguation)|tiara]] to enter and use the altar, but the other element '''must''' be a [[talisman]] when crafting combination runes. Clicking on the altar or using a pure essence on it will produce normal runes. To prevent creating the wrong runes, make sure you are using the complementary rune on the altar. For example, at the Fire Altar use the water runes on the altar. Combinations have a 50% success rate (or 100%, if the player is wearing a [[binding necklace]]), and the talisman is consumed in the process (unless the player uses the [[Lunar spellbook|Lunar spell]] [[Magic Imbue]]).
